title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha
name: Gatha Studio Workspace
description: Creating and distributing plugins, editions, contents in browser
author: Mohammad Rahmani
text:

tiddlers","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/Action","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" >{{!!caption}} <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title={{{ [function[plugin-full-path]addsuffix[/readme]] }}} $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/readme" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title={{{ [function[plugin-full-path]addsuffix[/license]] }}} $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/license" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title={{{ [function[plugin-full-path]addsuffix[/history]] }}} $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/history" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="[prepend[readme license history]]" /> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-edittemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-edittemplate","caption":"new edit iconTemplate="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/icon" iconTiddlerTitle={{{ [addsuffix[/icon]] }}}> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{!!caption}} <%if [is[missing]] %> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param=<> title=<> /> <%else%> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> <%endif%> tags="$:/tags/Global" /> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info","text":"\function get-field(fname) [get] \define addInfo-actions() <$action-setfield $index="title" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="version" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="stability" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="name" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="description" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="author" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="source" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="list" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="plugin-priority" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="parent-plugin" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="dependents" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="plugin-type" $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $index="core-version" $value={{{ [get[core-version]] ~[]}}} /> <$action-setfield $index="packaged-by" $value=<> /> \end <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{!!caption}} <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [] [[plugin.info]] :and[join[/]] }}} > <> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> ","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/Action","caption":"add plugin.info (for node.js)","code-body":"yes"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-procedure":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-procedure","caption":"new tags="$:/tags/Global" />"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-backup":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-backup","caption":"plugin source backup","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define plugin-exported-backup-json-filename() backup_$(pluginType)$_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.json \define export-plugin-source() <$set name=exportFilter filter="[prefix] [enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] [enlist{!!resource-tiddlers}] [[$:/config/$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/PublishFilter]has[title]]"> <$button class="" dragFilter=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin source as a json file"> {{$:/core/images/export-button}}plugin source (backup json file) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param="$:/core/templates/exporters/JsonFile" exportFilter=<> filename=<> /> \end <>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-demo":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-demo","caption":"export plugin+empty.jtml","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define plugin-exported-demo-filename() demo_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.html \procedure edit-plugin-plublish-filter-btn() <$button message="tm-edit-tiddler" param={{{ [[$:/config]][][][[PublishFilter]] :and[join[/]] }}} class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="edit plugin plublish filter">... \end \procedure export-demo-html() \function isdisabled() [get[release]!match[yes]then[yes]] <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin in a working demo wiki" disabled=<>> {{$:/core/images/globe}}plugin demo (demo.html) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/html-template" filename=<> currentTiddler=<> publisherName=<> pluginName=<> /> \end <>  <>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-packaged":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-packaged","caption":"export json file","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define plugin-exported-json-filename() $(pluginType)$_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.json \procedure export-packaged-plugin() \function isdisabled() [get[release]!match[yes]then[yes]] <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin as a packed json file" disabled=<>> {{$:/core/images/list}}packaged plugin (json file) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template" pluginType=<> currentTiddler=<> filename=<> /> \end export-packaged-plugin <>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-zipped":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-zipped","caption":"export zip file","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define plugin-exported-zip-filename() $(pluginType)$_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.zip \procedure tempZipTiddler() $:/temp/gatha/_ZipTiddler \procedure delete-temp-action() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \procedure renderContent() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-create" $param=<>/> <$list filter="[prefix!suffix[plugin.info]] -[]" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param=<> filename={{{ [split[/]butfirst[2]slugify[]join[/]addsuffix[.tid]] }}} tiddler=<> template="$:/core/templates/tid-tiddler" /> <$list filter="[addsuffix[/plugin.info]has[title]]" variable=plugininfoTiddler> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-add-text-file" $param=<> filename={{{ [][][[plugin.info]] :and[join[/]] }}} text={{{ [get[text]] }}} /> <$list filter="[enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] :filter[has[title]]" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param=<> filename={{{ [][][[extra]][search-replace:g[$:],[system]split[/]slugify[]join[/]addsuffix[.tid]] :and[join[/]] }}} tiddler=<> template="$:/core/templates/tid-tiddler" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-download" $param=<> filename=<> /> \end \procedure export-zipped-plugin() \function isdisabled() [get[release]!match[yes]then[yes]] <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin folder to be used with Tiddlywiki on Node.js" disabled=<>> {{$:/core/images/storyview-classic}}plugin folder (zip file) <> \end <>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/html-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/html-template","code-body":"yes","description":"inspired from $:/editions/tw5.com/download-empty","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure savingEmpty() yes \define saveTiddlerFilter() [[$:/core]] [[$:/isEncrypted]] [[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/snowwhite]] [[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]] -[[$:/boot/boot.css]] -[type[application/javascript]library[yes]] -[[$:/boot/boot.js]] -[[$:/boot/bootprefix.js]] [subfilter{$:/config/gatha/PublishFilter}] [subfilter{$:/config/$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/PublishFilter}] +[sort[title]] \end \procedure inject-packaged-plugin() `` \end <> {{$:/core/templates/tiddlywiki5.html}}"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template","code-body":"yes","tags":"show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure plugin-shadow-tiddlers() {"tiddlers": {<$list filter="[subfilter]" join=","> "{{{ [] +[jsonstringify[]] }}}": <$text text=<>/> } } \end <$set name=exportFilter filter="[prefix!suffix[plugin.info]] -[] [enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] :filter[has[title]]"> <$wikify name=pluginShadows text=<> > <$jsontiddler tiddler=<> $plugin-type={{!!plugin-draft}} $packaged-by=<> $text=<> exclude="plugin-draft extra-tiddlers resource-tiddlers release template" escapeUnsafeScriptChars="yes" /> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/common-procedures":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/common-procedures","code-body":"yes","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\function tid-addExtraTiddlers-ui() [[Gatha Add Bulk of Extra Tiddlers]] \function extra-or-resource-tiddlers-count() [getenlist-input[]count[]] \procedure remove-all() <%if [!match[0]] %> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" tooltip="remove all extra tiddlers" >remove all <$action-confirm $message=`Do you wish to remove all ($(extra-or-resource-tiddlers-count)$) $(target-field)$?`> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> /> <%else%> <$text text="drop tiddlers here"/> <%endif%> \end remove-all \procedure remove-tiddler-from-list() \procedure remove-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=<> $subfilter="-[]"/> <$button tooltip="remove tiddler" aria-label="remove tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right" actions=<> > {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$link/> \end remove-tiddler-from-list \procedure drop-actions() <%if [!prefix] :filter[has[title]] %> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore,]"/> <%endif%> \end drop-actions \procedure placeholder()
\end \procedure droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<> enable=<>> <>
<$transclude $variable="button"/>
\end droppable-item \procedure add-bulk-tiddler() <$button to=<> class="tc-btn-invisible ga-extra-button" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers"> {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="target-plugin" $value=<> /> \end add-bulk-tiddler "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tiddlers":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tiddlers","code-body":"yes","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <%if [getindex[add-extra-tiddlers]match[show]] %>
<>  Extra tiddlers  (<$count filter="[enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}]" />)
<$let gv-target-plugin=<> target-field="extra-tiddlers"> <$list filter="[list[!!extra-tiddlers]]" storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button=<> />
<$transclude $variable="droppable-item" button=<>/>
<%endif%>"},"Gatha Add Bulk of Extra Tiddlers":{"title":"Gatha Add Bulk of Extra Tiddlers","tags":"","target-plugin":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-tiddlers":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-tiddlers","code-body":"yes","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <%if [getindex[add-resource-tiddlers]match[show]] %>
Resource tiddlers  (<$count filter="[enlist{!!resource-tiddlers}]" />)
<$let gv-target-plugin=<> target-field="resource-tiddlers"> <$list filter="[list[!!resource-tiddlers]]" storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button=<> />
<$transclude $variable="droppable-item" button=<> />
<%endif%>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-filter","caption":"Filter search","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/Search","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox \procedure btn-actions() <$set name=bulktids filter={{{ [get[text]] }}} > <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!target-plugin}} $field={{{ [match[ctrl]then[resource-tiddlers]else[extra-tiddlers]] }}} $subfilter="[subfilter]" /> \end btn-actions \function resultFilter() [get[text]] \procedure add-by-filter-Button() \whitespace trim <%if [subfilterhas[title]] %> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers to target plugin" actions=<> > {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <%endif%> \end add-by-filter-Button Target plugin: {{!!target-plugin}} <$transclude $variable="add-bulk-tiddlers" label="Search by filter" placeholder="enter a filter e.g [tag[doc]]" addbutton=<> /> //<$count filter="[subfilterhas[title]]" /> matches// <$list filter="[subfilterhas[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-hierarchy":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-hierarchy","caption":"Hierarchical search","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/Search","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox \function rootTag() [get[text]trim[]] \procedure toc-list(here,max,exclude,level:"0",field:"tags") <%if [!match] %> <$let here={{{ [!match[]else] }}} sortby={{{ [get[list]] }}}> <$set name="excluded" filter="[subfilter] []"> <$set name="items" filter=`[contains:$(field)$!is[draft]sortby] -[enlist]`> <$list filter="[enlist] :filter[list] [enlist!list]" variable="item"> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]]}}}/>
<$macrocall $name="toc-list" here=<> max=<> exclude=<> level={{{ [add[1]] }}} field=<>/> <%endif%> \end toc-list \procedure btn-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!target-plugin}} $field={{{[match[ctrl]then[resource-tiddlers]else[extra-tiddlers]]}}} $subfilter="[subfilter]" /> \end \procedure add-by-hierarchy-Button() \whitespace trim <%if [enlisthas[title]] %> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers to target plugin" actions=<> > {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <%endif%> \end add-by-hierarchy-Button Target plugin: {{!!target-plugin}} <$wikify name=allTiddlers text="""<$macrocall $name=toc-list here=<> />""" > <$transclude $variable="add-bulk-tiddlers" label="Root tag" placeholder="enter a root tag e.g Contents" addbutton=<> /> //<$count filter="[enlist] :filter[has[title]]" /> matches//
<$transclude $variable=toc tag=<> />
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\function search-tempTid() [[$:/temp/gatha/add-bulk]] \procedure clear-action() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define clearButton() \whitespace trim <%if [get[text]trim[]!is[blank]] %> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<> >{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <%endif%> \end \procedure add-bulk-tiddlers(label, placeholder:"", addbutton) \whitespace trim
<$keyboard actions=<> key="escape"> <$text text=<
\end "},"$:/config/gatha/EditTemplateBodyFilters/PluginMetaData":{"title":"$:/config/gatha/EditTemplateBodyFilters/PluginMetaData","list-before":"$:/config/EditTemplateBodyFilters/canonical-uri","tags":"$:/tags/EditTemplateBodyFilter","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"[has:field[plugin-draft]then[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/edit-template-plugin-meta-data]]"},"$:/config/gatha/ViewTemplateBodyFilters/PluginMetaData":{"title":"$:/config/gatha/ViewTemplateBodyFilters/PluginMetaData","list-before":"$:/config/ViewTemplateBodyFilters/system","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplateBodyFilter","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"[has[plugin-draft]then[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/view-template-plugin-meta-data]]"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Full change log https://kookma.github.io/TW-Gatha/#ChangeLog * ''2.0.3'' -- 2025.07.07 -- updated to TiddlyWiki 5.3.7 * ''1.1.0'' -- 2024.08.10 -- rewritten from scratch for TW 5.3.5 * ''1.0.0'' -- 2022.02.25 -- stable release * ''0.9.5'' -- 2022.02.19 -- stable release candidate * ''0.8.1'' -- 2022.02.11 -- ui for add extra tiddlers * ''0.1.0'' -- 2019.01.12 -- first beta release "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/icon","text":"","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle-off":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle-off","library":"Font Awesome","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle-on":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle-on","library":"Font Awesome","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/load-plugin":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/load-plugin","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\function loadTid() [[$:/temp/gatha/load]] \function excluded-plugins() [[$:/temp/info-plugin]] [[$:/core]] [[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha]] \procedure load-actions() <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [get[text]] }}} > <$action-confirm $message="Do you wish to load selected plugin into Gatha and convert it to a draft? This action cannot be undone!"> <$list filter="[all[current]!has[plugin-draft]]"> <$action-setfield $field="plugin-draft" $value={{!!plugin-type}} /> <$set name=shadows filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]!prefix]"> <$action-setfield $field="extra-tiddlers" $value=<> /> <$list filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]]"> <$action-setfield $field=modified $value=<> /> <$action-deletefield text plugin-type/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-template" currentPlugin=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/popup/gatha/select-plugin"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end load-actions \procedure select-to-load() \procedure display-group(label, filter) > > <$list filter=<> > \end display-group Select plugin to modify <$select tiddler=<> default="select a plugin" > <> <> <> \end select-to-load \procedure load-plugin-ui() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" popup="$:/temp/popup/gatha/select-plugin" tooltip="load exisiting plugins to modify">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}load plugin <$reveal type="popup" state="$:/temp/popup/gatha/select-plugin" class="tc-popup-keep">
<> <$list filter="[get[text]]" variable=selected-plugin > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="margin:5px 0; padding:0;" actions=<> disabled=<> > {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} Load <$text text=<> />
\end load-plugin-ui"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"The <> has been loaded into ''Gatha''. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. <<<"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/language":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/language","caption":"Language","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/PluginType","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"`language` -- this plugin is a language package for the language "{{!!name}}". This language plugin will automatically be used when you select this language in the [[basic settings|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Basics]] of the [[control panel|$:/ControlPanel]]."},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/plugin":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/plugin","caption":"Plugin","list-before":"","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/PluginType","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\rules except wikilink `plugin` -- this is the most general form of a TiddlyWiki 5 plugin."},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/theme":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/theme","caption":"Theme","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/PluginType","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\rules except wikilink `theme` -- contains a TiddlyWiki 5 theme. You can select this theme through the [[theme switcher|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Theme]] in the [[control pane|$:/ControlPanel]]."},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/undefined":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/undefined","caption":"Undefined","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/PluginType","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$view field="plugin-draft"/> -- is an ''unknown plugin type''."},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/create-item":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/create-item","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure create-item(btncaption:"new item", type, title, template, tags) <$let base-title= {{{ [] [] [] :and[!is[blank]join[/]] }}} new-title= {{{ "[<unusedtitle baseName:$(base-title)$>]" :and[substitute[]] }}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" ><$text text=<<btncaption>> /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title={{{ [subfilter<new-title>] }}} tags=<<tags>> $param=<<template>> /> </$button> </$let> \end"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/create-plugin":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/create-plugin","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure create-new-plugin() <$button tooltip="create new plugin" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<<create-plugin-actions>> > {{$:/core/images/new-button}}<span class="tc-btn-text">new plugin</span> </$button> \end create-new-plugin \procedure create-plugin-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title="$:/plugins/PublisherName/PluginName" plugin-draft="plugin" stability="STABILITY_1_EXPERIMENTAL" type="application/json" release="yes" template=""/> \end "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/definition":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/definition","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure tidConfig() $:/config/gatha/UIElements"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/show-gatha-setting":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/show-gatha-setting","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure navigate-to-gatha-setting() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" > {{$:/core/images/options-button}} general settings <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307" text="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--697582678" text="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/Settings"/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel" $scroll="yes"/> </$button> \end"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; Gatha Studio Workspace Create Tiddlywiki plugins, themes, languages, editions, contents in browser in an easy way and distribute as packaged JSON file, Node.js plugin folder, or a Tiddlywiki app. ;Code and demo For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages * Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Gatha/ * Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Gatha "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/accordion":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/accordion","text":"/* The .kk-gatha-accordion is actually a CSS class to customize the summary element of the standard html details widget. It replace the marker with an animating svg down/up arrow. This is also available in Shiraz plugin. Accordion is used for Extra and Resource Tiddlers tree to expand/collapse large trees. */ .kk-gatha-accordion { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; cursor: pointer; padding-right:10px; } .kk-gatha-accordion::-webkit-details-marker { display: none; } .kk-gatha-accordion::after { content: ''; width: 24px; height: 24px; transition: 0.4s; background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; background-size: cover; } details[open] > .kk-gatha-accordion::after { transform: rotate(180deg); }","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/main":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/main","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"/*--------------- correct button svg color in sidebar */ .ga-sidebar button svg { fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>; } .ga-sidebar button:hover svg { fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover>>; } .ga-sidebar button.tc-btn-invisible { color: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>; } .ga-sidebar button.tc-btn-invisible:hover { color: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover>>; } /* when plugin release is disabled */ .ga-sidebar button:disabled.tc-btn-invisible, .ga-sidebar button:disabled.tc-btn-invisible { opacity:0.5; } .ga-sidebar button:disabled.tc-btn-invisible::after { content: "release is disabled"; font-style:italic; } /*--------------- tc-tree for tree macro*/ .ga-sidebar .tc-tree button { color:<<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>; font-weight:500; } .ga-sidebar .tc-tree li:hover svg{ fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover>>; } .ga-sidebar .tc-tree li span{ color:<<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>; } /*--- for the add bulk of tiddlers button */ .ga-extra-button{ opacity:0.4; } .ga-extra-label:hover .ga-extra-button{ opacity:1; } /*--------------- extra tiddlers tree */ .ga-sidebar .tc-sidebar-tab-open .tc-sidebar-tab-open-item button svg { fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>; } .ga-sidebar .tc-sidebar-tab-open .tc-sidebar-tab-open-item:hover button svg { fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover>>; } /*--- toggle in add extra tiddlers ui */ .tc-btn-invisible.ga-toggle-result svg { fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>; width:1.1em; height:1.1em; } .tc-btn-invisible.ga-toggle-result:hover svg { fill: <<colour sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover>>; } /*--- adjust hr for Export button */ .ga-hr{ margin-top:0.25rem; margin-bottom:0.25rem; } /*ther ui elements */ .ga-edit-publish{ width:95%; margin-top:5px; } .ga-sidebar .tc-drop-down button:hover { color: <<colour tiddler-link-background>>; background-color: <<colour tiddler-link-foreground>>; }"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/plugin-table":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/plugin-table","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":".ga-plugin-info{ width:100%; } .ga-plugin-edit-element-value input{ width:100%; } /* for gatha-thirdflow release table */ .ga-plugin-edit-element-value input[type=checkbox]{ width:auto; } td.ga-plugin-edit-element-name{ text-align: right; vertical-align: baseline; width:8em; min-width:4em; } /*-----------------------------------------*/ td.ga-plugin-info-element-name{ width:14rem; } /* the plugin-type input */ .ga-plugin-edit-element-value input[type=text], .ga-plugin-edit-element-value input[type=text].ga-plugin-edit-element-type, .ga-plugin-edit-element-value select { height: 1.75em; } .ga-plugin-edit-element-value input[type=text].ga-plugin-edit-element-type { width:70%; } .ga-plugin-edit-element-value select { width: calc(30% - 8px); border-width:2px; } /*---from tfc---*/ tr.ga-plugin-info-element td { padding-top: 0.4ex; padding-bottom: 0.4ex; vertical-align: baseline; } td.ga-plugin-info-element-name { text-align: right; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: nowrap; background-color: <<colour table-header-background>>; font-weight: bold; } td.ga-plugin-info-element-value { text-align: left; vertical-align: top; } span.ga-plugin-info-unspecified { font-style: italic; color: <<colour very-muted-foreground>>; } span.ga-plugin-info-unspecified:before { font-style: normal; content: "("; } span.ga-plugin-info-unspecified:after { font-style: normal; content: ")"; padding-left: 0.15em; }"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/styles/settings","text":"/*details html5 macro*/ details.ga-details > summary { padding: 2px 0px; font-weight:500; outline:none; } details.ga-details summary { cursor: pointer; } .tc-btn-invisible.ga-field-toggle .tc-image-fa-toggle-on, .tc-btn-invisible.ga-field-toggle .tc-image-fa-toggle-off { font-size: 1.4em; } ","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/button-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/button-template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$tiddler tiddler=<<currentTab>>> <$text text={{{ [<currentTiddler>split[/]last[]] }}}/> </$tiddler>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-template","code-body":"yes","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/common-procedures \whitespace trim \function plugin-full-path() [<namePrefix>] [<publisherName>] [<pluginName>] :and[join[/]] \function plugin-tiddlers() [prefix<currentTiddler>] -[<currentTiddler>] [enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] :filter[has[title]] \procedure disp-export-buttons() <div style="margin-top:10px;"><!-- export buttons --> ''Export plugin'' <hr class="ga-hr"> <%if [function[plugin-tiddlers]limit[1]] %><!-- show if the plugin has at least one shadow --> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]" variable=button> <div class="tc-menu-list-item" style="padding-left:14px;"> <$transclude tiddler=<<button>> mode="inline"/> </div> </$list> <%else%> <span>There is nothing to export, or plugin release is disabled!</span> <%endif%> </div> \end \procedure disp-plugin-tree() <!-- plugin actions --> <$let qp={{{ [<plugin-full-path>addprefix[$:/state/popup/actions/]] >}}} > <$button popup=<<qp>> class="tc-btn-invisible" selectedClass="tc-selected"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} </$button> <$reveal state=<<qp>> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes"> <div class="tc-drop-down"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/Action]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]"> <$transclude $mode="inline"/> </$list> </div> </$reveal> </$let> <!-- plugin author/name w. link --> <$link to=<<plugin-full-path>> />  (<$count filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix<plugin-full-path>] -[<plugin-full-path>]" />) <!-- list of plugin contents --> <div class="tc-tree" style="padding:6px 6px 6px 12px;"> <$transclude $variable="tree-node" prefix={{{ [<plugin-full-path>addsuffix[/]] }}} /> </div> \end disp-plugin-tree <$tiddler tiddler=<<currentTab>>> <$let pluginType = {{!!plugin-draft}} namePrefix = {{{ "$:/" [<pluginType>addsuffix[s]] :and[join[]] }}} pluginName = {{{ [<currentTiddler>removeprefix<namePrefix>split[/]last[1]] }}} publisherName = {{{ [<currentTiddler>removeprefix<namePrefix>split[/]!is[blank]first[1]] }}} pluginVersion = {{{ [<currentTiddler>get[version]else[0.0.0]] }}} timedate = <<now "YYYY0MM0DD">> > <!--- create the tab content for one plugin-draft ---> <$transclude $variable=disp-plugin-tree /> <!-- extra plugin tiddlers section --> {{||$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tiddlers}} <!-- resource tiddlers section --> {{||$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-tiddlers}} <!-- export button --> <$transclude $variable=disp-export-buttons /> </$let> </$tiddler>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/ide":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/ide","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/create-plugin \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/load-plugin \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/show-gatha-setting <div class="ga-sidebar"> <<create-new-plugin>><$list filter="[<tidConfig>getindex[load-plugin]match[show]]" variable=null> | <<load-plugin-ui>></$list> | <<navigate-to-gatha-setting>> <!-- creats tabs from plugin drafts --> <$transclude $variable="tabs" tabsList= "[all[tiddlers]has:field[plugin-draft]!has[draft.of]] :sort[split[/]!is[blank]last[]]" default= {{{ [all[tiddlers]has:field[plugin-draft]first[]] }}} buttonTemplate="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/button-template" template="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-template" explicitState="$:/state/tabs/gatha/ide" class="tc-vertical" /> </div>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Full change log https://kookma.github.io/TW-???/#ChangeLog * ''0.2.0'' -- 2020.03.12 -- new features added * ''0.1.0'' -- 2019.11.19 -- first plugin "},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/license","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Distributed under an MIT license. text=<<one>>/> <$slot $name="ts-raw"> Whale </$slot> \end"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/GeneralSettings":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/GeneralSettings","caption":"{{{ [<button-caption>match[insideControlPanel]then[General Settings]else[Gatha]] }}}","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/TiddlyWiki","tags":"$:/tags/Gatha/Settings $:/tags/MoreSideBar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/procedures/definition \procedure tidToggleVisibility() $:/temp/gatha/fields-visibility \function hiddenFields() author core-version dependents description extra-tiddlers name plugin-priority plugin-type parent-plugin plugin-draft release resource-tiddlers source stability template version \end \procedure toggle-plugin-fields-visibility() \function btn-svg() [<tidToggleVisibility>get[text]] :map[match[hide]then[on]]:else[[off]]:and[addprefix[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle-]] <$let status={{{[<tidToggleVisibility>get[text]] :map[match[hide]then[show]] :else[[hide]] }}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible ga-field-toggle" tooltip="hide/show plugin fields in edit mode"> <$transclude $tiddler=<<btn-svg>> $mode=inline/><span class="tc-btn-text">toggle fileds visibility</span> <$list filter="[function[hiddenFields]sort[title]addprefix[$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/]]"> <$action-setfield $field=text $value=<<status>> /> </$list> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<tidToggleVisibility>> $field="text" $subfilter="+[toggle[hide]]" /> </$button> </$let> \end <!-- used if and only if $:/plugins/kookma/gatha-thirdflow is installed --> \procedure open-released-demowiki-tab() <%if [[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha-thirdflow]!is[missing]] :filter[lookup:no[$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/]match[no]] %> For released demo settings under Node.js, see: <$button tooltip="show Release tab in Control Panel" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307" text="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--697582678" text="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/Settings"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/gatha/settings" text="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha-thirdflow/ui/controlpanel/released-demowiki"/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel" $scroll="yes"/> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} Released Demowiki </$button> <%endif%> \end open-released-demowiki-tab <div class="ga-sidebar"> These settings let you customise the behaviour of Gatha plugin.<br> <<open-released-demowiki-tab>> --- ;Show Gatha setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/GeneralSettings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox> ; Hide Gatha in sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/sidebar" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> Disable Gatha development interface</$checkbox> <details class="ga-details"> <summary>''Hide plugin fields''</summary> <dl> <dt style="margin-left:25px;margin-bottom:5px;"><<toggle-plugin-fields-visibility>></dt> <$list filter="[function[hiddenFields]sort[title]addprefix[$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/]]"> <dd><$checkbox tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field=text checked="hide" unchecked="show" default="show"> <$link/></$checkbox></dd> </$list> </dl> </details> ;Global publish filter ($:/config/gatha/PublishFilter) :<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/gatha/PublishFilter" field=text class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body ga-edit-publish" placeholder="filter exprestion to select tiddlers to be published with released demo e.g [tag[doc]]" default=""/> ;Advanced ptions :<$checkbox tiddler=<<tidConfig>> index="load-plugin" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide"> Show load-plugin button</$checkbox> :<$checkbox tiddler=<<tidConfig>> index="add-extra-tiddlers" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide"> Show extra tiddlers section</$checkbox> :<$checkbox tiddler=<<tidConfig>> index="add-resource-tiddlers" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide"> Show resource tiddlers section</$checkbox> </div>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/Settings","caption":"Gatha","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/TiddlyWiki","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\function button-caption() insideControlPanel These settings let you customise the behaviour of Gatha, and Gatha-Thirdflow plugins. The Gatha-Thirdflow can produce released plugins and demo wiki using Gatha. <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/Settings]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]" default="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/GeneralSettings" explicitState="$:/state/tab/gatha/settings" />"},"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/edit-template-plugin-meta-data":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/edit-template-plugin-meta-data","code-body":"yes","list-before":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure plugin-info-row(display-name, field-value) <tr class="ga-plugin-info-element"> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-name"> <$text text=<<display-name>> />: </td> <td class="ga-plugin-edit-element-value"> <$transclude $variable="field-value" $mode=inline> <span class='ga-plugin-info-unspecified'>unspecified</span> </$transclude> </td> </tr> \end \procedure plugin-edit-row(display-name, field, placeholder) <tr class="ga-plugin-info-element"> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-name"> <$text text=<<display-name>> />: </td> <td class="ga-plugin-edit-element-value"> <$edit-text field=<<field>> placeholder=<<placeholder>> /> </td> </tr> \end <!-- select plugin-type and update the draft title The update-draft-title-action used by select widget to update title of draft plugin --> \procedure update-draft-title-action() <$let old-draft-title={{{ [all[current]get[draft.title]split[/]butfirst[2]] +[join[/]] }}} > <$action-setfield $field="draft.title" $value={{{ [{!!plugin-draft}addprefix[$:/]addsuffix[s/]addsuffix<old-draft-title>] }}} /> </$let> \end \procedure plugin-edit-row-plugintype(display-name, field, placeholder) <tr class="ga-plugin-info-element"> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-name"> <$text text=<<display-name>> />: </td> <td class="ga-plugin-edit-element-value"> <$edit-text field=<<field>> placeholder=<<placeholder>> class="ga-plugin-edit-element-type"/>  <$select field=<<field>> default="plugin" actions=<<update-draft-title-action>> > <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/PluginType]] :filter[has[caption]get[caption]!match[Undefined]]"> <option value={{{ [{!!caption}lowercase[]] }}} ><$text text={{!!caption}}/></option> </$list> </$select> </td> </tr> \end \procedure plugin-edit-row-stability(display-name, field, placeholder) <tr class="ga-plugin-info-element"> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-name"> <$text text=<<display-name>> />: </td> <td class="ga-plugin-edit-element-value"> <$edit-text field=<<field>> placeholder=<<placeholder>> class="ga-plugin-edit-element-type"/>  <$select field=<<field>> default="STABILITY_1_EXPERIMENTAL"> <option value="STABILITY_0_DEPRECATED" >Deprecated</option> <option value="STABILITY_1_EXPERIMENTAL" >Experimental</option> <option value="STABILITY_2_STABLE" >Stable</option> <option value="STABILITY_3_LEGACY" >Legacy</option> </$select> </td> </tr> \end <!-- create the table --> <$list filter="[all[current]has:field[plugin-draft]]"> <div class="ga-plugin-info"> <table class="ga-plugin-info"> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin publisher" field-value={{{ [all[current]get[draft.title]split[/]nth[3]] }}} /> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin name" field-value={{{ [all[current]get[draft.title]split[/]nth[4]] }}} /> <<plugin-edit-row-plugintype "Plugin type" "plugin-draft" "plugin">> <<plugin-edit-row "Version" "version" "0.0.1">> <<plugin-edit-row-stability "Plugin stability" "stability" "STABILITY_1_EXPERIMENTAL">> <<plugin-edit-row "Display name" "name" "The name displayed in plugins page">> <<plugin-edit-row "Description" "description" "Tell TiddlyWiki users about what your plugin does">> <<plugin-edit-row "Author" "author" "U. K. Known">> <<plugin-edit-row "Source" "source" "https://example.org/foo">> <<plugin-edit-row "Plugin priority" "plugin-priority" "Numerical priority (higher numbers install later, the core plugin has a priority of zero">> <<plugin-edit-row "Plugin parent" "parent-plugin" "Title of the plugin under which this plugin should be displayed as a sub-plugin in the control panel plugin e.g. $:/plugins/kookma/utility">> <<plugin-edit-row "Plugin dependencies" "dependents" "Plugins that should be installed in order for this one to work e.g. $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz">> <<plugin-edit-row "Required TW Core version" "core-version" ">=5.1.23">> </table> </div> </$list> plugin-info-row(display-name, field-value) <tr class="ga-plugin-info-element"> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-name"> <$text text=<<display-name>> />: </td> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-value"> <$transclude $variable="field-value" $mode=inline> <span class='ga-plugin-info-unspecified'>unspecified</span> </$transclude> </td> </tr> \end \procedure update-plugin-info(display-name) <tr class="ga-plugin-info-element"> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-name"> <$text text=<<display-name>> />: </td> <td class="ga-plugin-info-element-value"><!-----changed-----> <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info]]"> <$let plugin-full-path=<<currentTiddler>> > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="create and update plugin.info"> update <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [<plugin-full-path>] [[plugin.info]] :and[join[/]] }}} > <<addInfo-actions>> <$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/><!-- open the plugin.info file --> </$tiddler> </$button> </$let> </$importvariables> </td> </tr> \end update-plugin-info <$list filter="[all[current]has:field[plugin-draft]]"> {{||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}} <div class="ga-plugin-info"> <table class="ga-plugin-info"> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin publisher" field-value={{{ [all[current]split[/]nth[3]] }}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin name" field-value={{{ [all[current]split[/]nth[4]] }}}/> <$let plugin-type={{!!plugin-draft}} plugin-desc={{{ [[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/]addsuffix<plugin-type>] :map[get[text]] }}} > <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin type" field-value=<<plugin-desc>> /> </$let> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Version" field-value={{!!version}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin stability" field-value={{!!stability}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Display name" field-value={{!!name}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Description" field-value={{!!description}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Author" field-value={{!!author}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Source" field-value={{!!source}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Information tabs" field-value={{!!list}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin priority" field-value={{!!plugin-priority}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin parent" field-value={{!!parent-plugin}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Plugin dependencies" field-value={{!!dependents}}/> <$transclude $variable="plugin-info-row" display-name="Required TW Core version" field-value={{!!core-version}}/> <<update-plugin-info "Plugin.info">> </table> </div> </$list> "}}}
